question_text: Welcome to this survey. Press Next to begin.

Please indicate how frequently or infrequently you currently have each experience. Please answer according to what really reflects your experience rather than what you think your experience should be.
I could be experiencing some emotion and not be conscious of it until some time later.
option_text: Almost Always: 1,Very Frequently: 2,Somewhat Frequently: 3,Somewhat Infrequently: 4,Very Infrequently: 5,Almost Never: 6

question_text: I break or spill things because of carelessness, not paying attention, or thinking of something else.
option_text: Almost Always: 1,Very Frequently: 2,Somewhat Frequently: 3,Somewhat Infrequently: 4,Very Infrequently: 5,Almost Never: 6

question_text: I find it difficult to stay focused on what’s happening in the present.
option_text: Almost Always: 1,Very Frequently: 2,Somewhat Frequently: 3,Somewhat Infrequently: 4,Very Infrequently: 5,Almost Never: 6

question_text: I tend to walk quickly to get where I’m going without paying attention to what I experience along the way.

question_text: I tend not to notice feelings of physical tension or discomfort until they really grab my attention.
